summary: This bill, the "Connecting Communities Post Disasters Act of 2025," aims to expedite the replacement or improvement of communications facilities after major disasters or emergencies declared by the President. It exempts such projects from certain environmental and historical preservation reviews under the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) and the National Historic Preservation Act (NHPA), streamlining the authorization process for communications infrastructure projects within disaster-affected areas. The bill defines key terms, including 'covered project' and 'communications facility'.
